info.title: Amazon SageMaker geospatial capabilities
info.description: Provides APIs for creating and managing SageMaker geospatial resources.

servers.description: The Amazon SageMaker geospatial capabilities multi-region endpoint
The Amazon SageMaker geospatial capabilities multi-region endpoint
The Amazon SageMaker geospatial capabilities endpoint for China (Beijing) and China (Ningxia)
The Amazon SageMaker geospatial capabilities endpoint for China (Beijing) and China (Ningxia)

delete.description: Use this operation to delete an Earth Observation job.

parameters.name: Arn
parameters.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the Earth Observation job being deleted.

get.description: Get the details for a previously initiated Earth Observation job.

parameters.name: Arn
parameters.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the Earth Observation job.

delete.description: Use this operation to delete a Vector Enrichment job.

parameters.name: Arn
parameters.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the Vector Enrichment job being deleted.

get.description: Retrieves details of a Vector Enrichment Job for a given job Amazon Resource Name (ARN).

parameters.name: Arn
parameters.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the Vector Enrichment job.

post.description: Use this operation to export results of an Earth Observation job and optionally source images used as input to the EOJ to an S3 location.

Arn.description: The input Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the Earth Observation job being exported.

ExecutionRoleArn.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the IAM role that you specified for the job.

ExportSourceImages.description: The source images provided to the Earth Observation job being exported.

OutputConfig.description: The response structure for an OutputConfig returned by an ExportEarthObservationJob.

allOf.description: Path to Amazon S3 storage location for the output configuration file.

post.description: Use this operation to copy results of a Vector Enrichment job to an S3 location.

Arn.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the Vector Enrichment job.

ExecutionRoleArn.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the IAM rolewith permission to upload to the location in OutputConfig.

OutputConfig.description: An object containing information about the output file.

get.description: Use this operation to get details of a specific raster data collection.

parameters.name: Arn
parameters.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the raster data collection.

get.description: Gets a web mercator tile for the given Earth Observation job.

parameters.name: Arn
parameters.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the tile operation.

parameters.name: ImageAssets
parameters.description: The particular assets or bands to tile.

parameters.name: ImageMask
parameters.description: Determines whether or not to return a valid data mask.

parameters.name: OutputDataType
parameters.description: The output data type of the tile operation.

parameters.name: OutputFormat
parameters.description: The data format of the output tile. The formats include .npy, .png and .jpg.

parameters.name: PropertyFilters
parameters.description: Property filters for the imagery to tile.

parameters.name: Target
parameters.description: Determines what part of the Earth Observation job to tile. 'INPUT' or 'OUTPUT' are the valid options.

parameters.name: TimeRangeFilter
parameters.description: Time range filter applied to imagery to find the images to tile.

parameters.name: x
parameters.description: The x coordinate of the tile input.

parameters.name: y
parameters.description: The y coordinate of the tile input.

parameters.name: z
parameters.description: The z coordinate of the tile input.

post.description: Use this operation to get a list of the Earth Observation jobs associated with the calling Amazon Web Services account.

parameters.name: MaxResults
parameters.description: Pagination limit

parameters.name: NextToken
parameters.description: Pagination token

MaxResults.description: The total number of items to return.

NextToken.description: If the previous response was truncated, you receive this token. Use it in your next request to receive the next set of results.

SortBy.description: The parameter by which to sort the results.

SortOrder.description: An optional value that specifies whether you want the results sorted in Ascending or Descending order.

StatusEquals.description: A filter that retrieves only jobs with a specific status.

get.description: Use this operation to get raster data collections.

parameters.name: MaxResults
parameters.description: The total number of items to return.

parameters.name: NextToken
parameters.description: If the previous response was truncated, you receive this token. Use it in your next request to receive the next set of results.

get.description: Lists the tags attached to the resource.

parameters.name: ResourceArn
parameters.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the resource you want to tag.

put.description: The resource you want to tag.

parameters.name: ResourceArn
parameters.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the resource you want to tag.

Tags.description: Each tag consists of a key and a value.

post.description: Retrieves a list of vector enrichment jobs.

parameters.name: MaxResults
parameters.description: Pagination limit

parameters.name: NextToken
parameters.description: Pagination token

MaxResults.description: The maximum number of items to return.

NextToken.description: If the previous response was truncated, you receive this token. Use it in your next request to receive the next set of results.

SortBy.description: The parameter by which to sort the results.

SortOrder.description: An optional value that specifies whether you want the results sorted in Ascending or Descending order.

StatusEquals.description: A filter that retrieves only jobs with a specific status.

post.description: Allows you run image query on a specific raster data collection to get a list of the satellite imagery matching the selected filters.

parameters.name: NextToken
parameters.description: Pagination token

Arn.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the raster data collection.

NextToken.description: If the previous response was truncated, you receive this token. Use it in your next request to receive the next set of results.

RasterDataCollectionQuery.description: This is a RasterDataCollectionQueryInput containing AreaOfInterest, Time Range filter and Property filters.

post.description: Use this operation to create an Earth observation job.

ClientToken.description: A unique token that guarantees that the call to this API is idempotent.

ExecutionRoleArn.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the IAM role that you specified for the job.

allOf.description: The location of the input data.>
The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the previous Earth Observation job.

JobConfig.description: The input structure for the JobConfig in an EarthObservationJob.

KmsKeyId.description: The Amazon Key Management Service (KMS) key ID for server-side encryption.

Name.description: The name of the Earth Observation job.

Tags.description: Each tag consists of a key and a value.

post.description: Creates a Vector Enrichment job for the supplied job type. Currently, there are two supported job types: reverse geocoding and map matching.

ClientToken.description: A unique token that guarantees that the call to this API is idempotent.

ExecutionRoleArn.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the IAM role that you specified for the job.

InputConfig.description: The input structure for the InputConfig in a VectorEnrichmentJob.

JobConfig.description: It contains configs such as ReverseGeocodingConfig and MapMatchingConfig.

KmsKeyId.description: The Amazon Key Management Service (KMS) key ID for server-side encryption.

Name.description: The name of the Vector Enrichment job.

Tags.description: Each tag consists of a key and a value.

post.description: Use this operation to stop an existing earth observation job.

Arn.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the Earth Observation job being stopped.

post.description: Stops the Vector Enrichment job for a given job ARN.

Arn.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the Vector Enrichment job.
